definition: Qin Shihuang (259-210 BC), the first emperor
primogenitor/founder of a school or trade
lit. the first person to bury funerary dolls (idiom)/fig. the originator of an evil practice
not expected at the outset (idiom)/unforeseen/to be surprised by the turn of events

sentences.english: That day Fuchida gave his heart to Christ.
sentences.chinese: 从那天始，渊田归向基督。

sentences.english: At stroke of midnight God shall win.
sentences.chinese: 现在始与上帝斗，午夜帝胜他归乡。

sentences.english: Leaders should be broad-minded enough to tolerate different opinions.
sentences.chinese: 领导者应该心胸开阔，始能容忍不同的主张。

sentences.english: Many receive advice, only the wise profit by it.
sentences.chinese: 许多人听到忠告，唯智者始能受益。

sentences.english: Are the seeds of criminal behavior sown early in life ?
sentences.chinese: 犯罪行为的根源是否始自幼时？

sentences.english: Phoebe hasperformed over 25 original songs on the show since the firstseason.
sentences.chinese: 自第一季始，菲比共演唱了25首原创歌曲。

sentences.english: Steady progress can only be the result of persistent study.; Only persistent study yields steady progress.
sentences.chinese: 坚持学习，始能不断进步。

sentences.english: The seventh from Adam in Cain's line was Lamech.
sentences.chinese: 从亚当始，该隐的家系中第七世孙命叫拉麦。

sentences.english: It is difficult to know at what moment love begins; it is less difficult to know that it has begun.
sentences.chinese: 难知爱自何时始，易知已经开始爱。

sentences.english: Tang Dynasty was the period when novels began to be initiated.
sentences.chinese: 唐代，是“始有意为小说”的时期。

sentences.english: Tibetan lamas began to live in the capital from Hongwu period of Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 藏族喇嘛僧人留住京城始于明初洪武年间。

sentences.english: After their arrest, and before they were led away to prison, the five catechumens were baptized.
sentences.chinese: 被捕后，始被带离监狱，这五个新慕道者受洗。

sentences.english: "Jiangdu" in name before seen in history.
Since "Ark" before, Zhang began to doubt the love.
sentences.chinese: 而自《方舟》始，张洁开始怀疑爱情。

sentences.english: This Agreement will be effective upon the execution of this Agreement by the Parties.
sentences.chinese: 本合约自甲乙双方签定后，始生效力。

sentences.english: Hu Wugong has worked as a news photographer since 1969.
sentences.chinese: 他自一九六九年始从事新闻摄影。

definition: old variant of 曆|历[li4]/old variant of 歷|历[li4]
self/oneself/sixth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/sixth in order/letter "F" or Roman "VI" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/hexa
to open/to start/to initiate/to enlighten or awaken/to state/to inform
Qi son of Yu the Great 禹[Yu3], reported founder of the Xia Dynasty 夏朝[Xia4 Chao2] (c. 2070-c. 1600 BC)
classical final particle, similar to modern 了[le5]
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
start and development/thread (of a story)/general outline/clue
